description:
Make the mountain more comfortable. With 100% recycled fabric and high-loft synthetic insulation, our light and versatile Cirrus Jacket is perfect for all mountain adventures.

The recycled Cirrus Jacket is filled with PrimaLoft® Silver Insulation Luxe™. Developed to provide the feel and warmth of down using 100% recycled, ultra-fine synthetic fibres, this insulation is water-repellent, compressible, and highly efficient. To make moving in the mountains more comfortable, the Cirrus Jacket features a soft, lightweight, 100% recycled 30D Pertex® Quantum shell with a DWR coating for extra weather resistance, with elasticated cuffs for a seamless fit with gloves.

Slim enough to operate as a midlayer but tough enough to operate as an outer, the Cirrus Jacket is versatile and stylish. It packs neatly into an integrated stuff sack for fast-response layering as the conditions demand.
name: Rab Cirrus Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 100% Recycled Polyamide Outer with 100% Recycled Polyamide Lining
